header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Favourite pets, Red Pandas, Malamooche (Dogs), my cat, present for friend, arrangements for birthday party, schedule for holidays, Japanese films, IPad and using laptops, board games, gymnastics lessons
header.activity: Discussion with son about pets, favourite animals and arranging birthday party.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler
